arguments.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load data
df = pd.read_csv('inflation.csv')

# Convert date column to datetime
df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'])

# Group by year and calculate average inflation
average_inflation = df.groupby(df['date'].dt.year)['inflation'].mean()

# Plot time series
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.plot(average_inflation.index, average_inflation.values, marker='o')
plt.title('Average Yearly Inflation')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Average Inflation')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load data
df = pd.read_csv("inflation.csv")

# Convert date column to datetime
df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'])

# Group by year and calculate average inflation
average_inflation = df.groupby(df['date'].dt.year)['inflation'].mean()

# Plot time series
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.plot(average_inflation.index, average_inflation.values, marker='o')
plt.title('Average Yearly Inflation')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Average Inflation')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

arguments.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load the CSV file
df = pd.read_csv("/var/folders/rb/qv8vwgyj6yjd3t4pwsy9t0rm0000gn/T/tmpoy7lzzan/HWxJnIYlinflation.csv")

# Convert the 'Year' column to datetime
df['Year'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Year'], format='%Y')

# Group by 'Year' and calculate the average inflation
df_avg_inflation = df.groupby('Year')['Inflation'].mean().reset_index()

# Plot the average yearly inflation as a time series
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.plot(df_avg_inflation['Year'], df_avg_inflation['Inflation'], marker='o')
plt.title('Average Yearly Inflation')
plt.xlabel('Year')
plt.ylabel('Inflation')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
